tool_description: Introducing the Sentiment Analysis API by Pizza API - a cutting-edge tool that provides instant sentiment analysis of any given text. With this API, you can easily determine whether a piece of text is positive, negative, or neutral in tone. The API uses advanced natural language processing techniques to analyse text and provide accurate results in real-time.  The Sentiment Analysis API is incredibly easy to use, simply send a request to the API with the text you want to analyse, and the API w...
name: Text Sentiment Analysis
